subject: Error
msgSnippet: Hi, Iam new member for this group,i just started learning Junit,when iam trying to run Junit test Samples iam getting following error .please provide necessary
messageBody:
Hi,
Iam new member for this group,i just started learning Junit,when iam trying to run Junit test Samples iam getting following error .please provide necessary solution

Version of Junit :3.8.1

;c:\jdk1.4\lib\tools.jar;
C:\>cd juni*

C:\junit3.8.1>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
.........................................
.........................................
...................E..................

tFoundException: junit.tests.runner.ClassLoaderTest

java:124)

lassLoaderTest.java:16)
